name: Obstacle Assault V1
description:
Hello! My name is Calae and I am learning UE5. I am following a course on GameDev.tv, linked here. This is the second finished project out of 5. I will be challenging myself after completing each project to think of some new additions or mechanics I could add to make the game more fun and implement them. Version 2 of this project here!

In this game, you control a character with the goal to navigate the obstacle course and reach the castle at the top. The controls are as follows:

  • WASD: Move around
  • Space Bar: Jump
  • R: Restart the game
  • Escape: Exit the game

See how fast you can get to the top!
